author: dailystar
title: Syrian army launches Aleppo offensive with Hezbollah support | News , Middle East
text:
A version of this article appeared in the print edition of The Daily Star on October 17, 2015, on page 1. Syria army, allies advance near Aleppo with Russian cover
Syrian army launches Aleppo offensive with Iranian support
Syria gvt in new offensive as Putin blasts US
